name: MetaOps
summary:
Join the battlefield and team up with your friends to put your tactical skills to the test within MetaOps, a first-person shooter built on Unity. Game Modes: Multiplayer, Campaign (soon) and Battle Royale (soon)

MetaOps harnesses the power of blockchain gaming, providing players with ownership of their earned assets to keep, trade or sell.
